metadata.title: CVE-2018-15161 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The libesedb_key_append_data function in libesedb_key.c inlibesedb through 2018-04-01 allows remote attackers to cause a heap-basedbuffer over-read via a crafted esedb file. NOTE: the vendor has disputedthis as described in the GitHub issue comments.

criterions.comment: libesedb package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
